description: Details of the installation of services pursuant to condition 22 of listed building consent ref: P/2010/0786 dated 10/12/2010 for Change of use from cinema (Class D2), to mixed use comprising an internal retail market (class A1) and two restaurants (Class A3) at ground floor level, a gym with ancillary health clinic (Class D2) at mezzanine and first floor levels and other ancillary uses including WC's, internal storage, office space and plant space, reconfiguration of internal space together with internal alterations and internal lighting and external alterations including installation of rooflights and new windows, reinstatement of original windows, modified access and canopy to the rear, loading bay and acoustic barrier, installation of ventilation and extract system and removal of existing external staircase.
